title: Chairman PMYP congratulates Sybil and Veronica for winning Gold Medals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP):Chairman of the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme (PMYP) Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan, on Wednesday, extended warm congratulations to the Women Weightlifters sisters Sybil Sohail and Veronica Sohail for achieving the Gold Medals in the Asian Pacific African Weightlifting Championship.
Expressing immense pleasure on their victory, he said that Sybil’s and Veronica’s incredible talent and dedication had earned the highest honour for the country.
“We’re beyond proud of you both for your outstanding achievement and your perseverance and passion are a reminder that dreams do come true.”
The Chairman emphasized the importance of sports in promoting unity, resilience, and national pride and reiterated the Government’s commitment to providing all necessary resources and support to empower and enhance Pakistan’s standing in the world of sports.
